title: Watch Dogs-Steam006
description:
:::::::::: Steam006 and Meerk4t PRESENTS :::::::::


:::: Watch Dogs MULTi15 Full Version ::::


::Information::


Year: 2014 
Genre: Action, Adventure 
Developer: Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Romania, Ubisoft Reflections 
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: License 
Language: English / Multi15 
Language: English 
Medicine: Present (Steam006)


::Description::


According to the story, in 2003, one of the workers cut off electricity 
to power the vast metropolis, leaving millions of people without power, 
while in the urban system by downloading a virus. 


::System Requirement::


OS: Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 (SP1) or Windows 8 
(Please note that we only support 64 bit OS.) 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400 @ 2.66Ghz or AMD Phenom II X4 940 @ 3.0Ghz 
Memory: 6 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1 GB Video RAM - Nvidia Geforce GTX 
460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 
DirectX: Version 11 
Hard Drive: 25 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers 


::Installation Steps::


1) Download the torrent.

2) Install Uplay.

3) Open Uplay and login with fake or any account.

4) Run GameLauncher_x64.exe to start the game.

5) Support the Developers.


::READNFO::


A lucky leak version of Watch dogs, now this is the real deal guys Alpha just 

blazed, why same because Repacks needed Russian and this is English so repack 

when the steam versions makes its mark on scene, now this version is not fully

optimized as many of you guys who have notice it, little bugs in the game but

if the early mega game comes in action so who will leave it, so for people who

need some piece of it early so we say go for it, otherwise 4 days remaining in

release of the steam with DLC and optimization so wait, choice in your hand and

for others enjoy this beautiful release, all working if instructions are read 

carefully and as noted down and have a great weekend boys and girls, peace out!


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT goes to Steam006 for Source and Meerk4t for Distribution.
